title: I’m full!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>I’m full~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I ate too much chocolates my nose might start bleeding~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ah, me too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ah! That’s right!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>What’s up, Chika-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>This is a special among specials~. Honoka-chan! I want you to eat this!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>This is….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>It’s a chocolate covered mikan that has been dried and coated with sweets!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ah, I think I saw this on television!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>The other day, when I was at a place that sells valentine chocolates, I saw orange and lemon chocolates! So I thought you can also do that with mikan! So I made them together with Riko-chan and You-chan~. Eat it eat it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Chika-chan, you really do love mikan huh….Then, thanks for the food! Munch munch…. This is deliciousー! Seconds pleaseー!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
